title: Options
name: ClientOptions
description: Default configuration
groupDescription:
The Seguir client provides a simple and consistent API for interacting with a seguir server.

This can only be used server side, as it uses the appId and appSecret which should never be shared within pure client side code. This client allows you to provide the 'logged in user' which means that you can effectively create any relationship or item you like (even outside of) an actual true user session - e.g. by system events.

title: getFeed
name: getFeedForUser
description: Retrieve the aggregated newsfeed for a specific user.

Parameter.description: the id of the current logged in user
the user to retrieve the feed for
pagination - item to start at
pagination - number of items to show
callback

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to retrieve the newsfeed for a specific user.

title: getUserFeed
name: getUserFeedForUser
description: Retrieve the direct newsfeed for a specific user, can be shown on their profile.

Parameter.description: the id of the current logged in user
the user to retrieve the feed for
pagination - item to start at
pagination - number of items to show
callback

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to retrieve the newsfeed for a specific user.

examples.title: getUserFeed result

title: followUser
name: followUser
description: Follow a user

Parameter.description: the id of the current logged in user
the id of the user to follow
time to leave the request
is this visible only to friends
is this visible only to the user
callback

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to manage follow relationships.

title: getFollow
name: getFollow
description: Retrieve details of a specific follow relationship

Parameter.description: the id of the current logged in user
the id of the follow relationship
callback

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to manage follow relationships.

title: getFollowers
name: getFollowers
description: Retrieve a list of followers for a user

Parameter.description: the id of the current logged in user
the id of user to retrieve followers for
callback

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to manage follow relationships.

examples.title: getFollowers result

Parameter.description: the id of the current logged in user
the id of user to remove as a follower
callback

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to manage follow relationships.

description: Stop following a user

Parameter.description: the id of the current logged in user
the id of follow relationship
callback

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to manage follow relationships.

title: acceptFriendRequest
name: acceptFriendRequest
description: Create a friend request with message

Parameter.description: the id of the current logged in user
the id of friend request to accept
callback

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to manage the friend request process.

title: addFriendRequest
name: addFriendRequest
description: Create a friend request with message

Parameter.description: the id of the current logged in user
the id of the user to send a friend request to
a message to leave with the request
time to leave the request
callback

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to manage the friend request process.

name: getFriendRequests
description: Retrieve pending friend requests for the current logged in user

Parameter.description: the id of the current logged in user
callback

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to manage the friend request process.

title: getFriend
name: getFriend
description: Get details of a specific friendship

Parameter.description: the id of the current logged in user
the id of the friend relationship
callback

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to manage the friend request process.

title: getFriends
name: getFriends
description: Retrieve a list of friends for a specific user

Parameter.description: the id of the current logged in user
the id of the user to get the list of friends for
callback

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to manage the friend request process.

title: removeFriend
name: removeFriend
description: End a friendship

Parameter.description: the id of the current logged in user
the id of the user to stop being friends with
callback

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to manage the friend request process.

title: addLike
name: addLike
description: Signal that you like a specific URL

Parameter.description: the id of the current logged in user
the url of the page to like
callback

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to signal that you like a specific URL.

name: checkLike
description: Check if the user likes a specific URL

Parameter.description: the id of the current logged in user
the url to check if the user likes
callback

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to signal that you like a specific URL.

title: getLike
name: getLike
description: Retrieve details of a specific like item by id

Parameter.description: the id of the current logged in user
the id of the like that you want to retrieve details for
callback

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to signal that you like a specific URL.

name: removeLike
description: Check if the user likes a specific URL

Parameter.description: the id of the current logged in user
the url to remove the like for
callback

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to signal that you like a specific URL.

the id of the user to follow
time to leave the request
is this visible only to friends
is this visible only to the user
callback

the id of the post to remove

title: addUser
name: addUser
description: Creates a new user.

Parameter.description: the id of the current logged in user [not used]
the username
the local / alternate id
arbitrary user data (one level of key values only)
callback

groupDescription: This is a collection of methods that allow you to create and retrieve users.

the id of the user

the id of the user
